shouldMatch: Project is configured to use managed identity for Azure PostgreSQL authentication.
Configuration references Azure managed identity name for PostgreSQL connection.
Password property for PostgreSQL is removed from configuration.
JDBC connection string does not contain password segment.
Passwordless authentication is enabled for PostgreSQL connection.
shouldNotMatch: Project uses hardcoded password for PostgreSQL authentication.
JDBC connection string contains password segment.
No managed identity name found in configuration.
Password property is still present for PostgreSQL authentication.
